info.name: Karneval
info.description:
# Introduction
Backend till lundakarnevalen 2018.

# Overview
Testserver på 146.185.173.31:3000, exempel är till localhost. Endast JSON accepteras.

# Error Codes
200: OK 

400: User sent bad information or missing parameters 

401: User does not have appropriate privileges 

404: No such end point 

500: Internal error, not caused by user

request.description:
Register request. The following data can be sent.

email:
phoneNumber:
firstName:
lastName:
address:
postNumber:
city:
careOf:
personalNumber:
language:
driversLicense:
foodPreference:
disability:
audition: 
talent:
entertainmentCategory: 
corps: 
startOfStudies:
pastInvolvement: 
groupLeader:
interests:
misc: 
plenipotentiary:

header.description: Options that are desired for the connection

header.name: Content-Length
header.description: The length of the response body in octets (8-bit bytes)

header.name: Content-Type
header.description: The mime type of this content

header.name: Date
header.description: The date and time that the message was sent

header.name: ETag
header.description: An identifier for a specific version of a resource, often a message digest

header.name: X-Powered-By
header.description: Specifies the technology (ASP.NET, PHP, JBoss, e.g.) supporting the web application (version details are often in X-Runtime, X-Version, or X-AspNet-Version)
